caption.p: Counts of total aerobic mesophilic bacteria ( P < 0.0001; CV = 9.54%), Enterobacteriaceae ( P = 0.0066; CV = 98.24%), and molds and yeasts ( P = 0.6544; CV = 37.59%) on eggshell surfaces according to different treatments. 1 a,bMeans with different letters differ significantly ( P < 0.05). Abbreviations: CEO, clove essential oil; CV, coefficient of variation; GA, grain alcohol; NS, nonsanitized; PFA, paraformaldehyde. 1Results are expressed in log 10 CFU/mL pooled over 4 eggs.
